<S%G1161>But<s%> to do <S%G2140>good<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G2842>share<s%> <S%G1950>forget<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> with <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifices<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is well <S%G2100>pleased<s%>.

<S%G3982>Obey<s%> them that have the rule <S%G2233>over<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> submit <S%G5226>yourselves<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G69>watch<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5590>souls<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> they that must <S%G591>give<s%> <S%G3056>account<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> they may <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5124>it<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> with <S%G4727>grief<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5124>that<s%> is <S%G255>unprofitable<s%> for <S%G5213>you<s%>.

<S%G4336>Pray<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> we <S%G3982%G99999>trust<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G2309>willing<s%> to <S%G390>live<s%> <S%G2573>honestly<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G1515>peace<s%>, that brought <S%G321>again<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, that <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4166>shepherd<s%> of the <S%G4263>sheep<s%>, <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G166>everlasting<s%> <S%G1242>covenant<s%>,

Know <S%G1097>you<s%> that our <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> is set at <S%G630>liberty<s%>; <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> he <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G5032>shortly<s%>, I will <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>.
